main event: A witness observed a bright light in the sky that moved rapidly and disappeared in about 1 second on 6/30/30 in North Merrick, NY.
interesting points: The light was described as similar to a star but much brighter,The witness reported the light moving southerly before it vanished,Weather conditions were overcast at the time of the sighting,The object did not emit any exhaust or noise, and there was no evidence of a vapor trail left by the object.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: male witness with experience observing aerial phenomena
